title: National Public Transport Access Nodes (NaPTAN) - Coach Stations

queries.query: select * from naptan_coach_stations order by ST_Distance(LatLong, ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint($2, $1), 4326));
queries.description: Find coach stations closest to a lat/lon point
queries.name: nearest

queries.query: select * from naptan_coach_stations where LatLong && ST_MakeEnvelope($2, $1, $4, $3, 4326);
queries.description: Find coach stations within a region
queries.name: extent

queries.query: select * from naptan_coach_stations where ST_DISTANCE((select latlong from codepoint where postcode = normalise_postcode($1)), latlong) < (1000 * $2);
queries.description: Find coach stations near to a postcode (distance in km)
queries.name: postcode
